page.title: 20Playing Musical Instruments
page.content: Many children learn to play a musical instrument at school. Only four in the top two classes learn an instrument {(piano)}at home. As well as{pitched {percussion}in music lessons some learn {violin}from a visiting teacher during school time and children in the three junior classes are able to join lunch time clubs to learn the{recorder}and {guitar.}Although some stop playing, a lot continue and half the children in our class were still playing at the end of the year when most of them will be leaving for secondary school. Most of the players are girls. Most learn the recorder and once a year the older players join in a recorder festival with other local schools when we spend a morning play- ing with and to each other. We play both early music and modern arrange- ments on tenor, treble and descant.
